text: Click here for GET Post Details RITES Limited Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Manager Posts: RITES Limited has invited applications for the recruitment of Manager (E&S), Manager (Logistics) vacancies on regular basis. Eligible candidates can apply online from 22-02-2017 to 16-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process and how to apply are given below… Rites Ltd Vacancy Details: Total No. of Vacancies: 02 Name of the Posts: 1. Manager (E&S): 01 Post 2. Manager (Logistics): 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates maximum age should be 40 years as on 01-02-2017. Age relaxation is applicable as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Full time first class Master’s Degree in Traffic Engineering/ Transport Planning or Full time first class Master’s Degree in Economics/ Business Economics/ Operation Research/ Statistics or Full time first class MBA with specialization in Finance and Marketing for Post 1, Full time first class Master’s Degree in Transport Planning or Full time first class Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering with Diploma in Logistics Management/ Supply Chain Management or Full time first class Master’s Degree in Economics with Diploma in Logistics Management/ Supply Chain Management or Full time first class MBA in Logistics Management for Post 2. Selection Process: Selection will be based on written test/ interview. How to Apply: Candidates may apply online through the website www.rites.com from 22-02-2017 to 16-03-2017 & send hard copy of application along with 2 recent passport size colour photographs, self attested copies of certificates of qualification, date of birth, experience, Proof of identity, caste certificate to Assistant Manager (P)/ Rectt., RITES Ltd., RITES Bhawan, Plot No.1, Sector-29, Gurgaon – 122001, Haryana on or before 27-03-2017. Instructions for Online Application: 1. Log on to the website www.rites.com. 2. Click on the link “Careers”—> Online Registration. 3. Select the desired post & apply Online. 4. Fill all the details carefully & submit the form. 5. Take print copy of application form for future use. Important Dates: Start Date for Submission of Online Applications 22-02-2017 Last Date for Submission of Online Applications 16-03-2017 Last Date for Receipt of Hard Copy of Applications 27-03-2017
